column4: Hi guys, i'm getting: FastCgiIpcDir /var/lib/apache2/fastcgi: access for server (uid 1001, gid 1001) failed: write not allowe
I believe that folder is owned by www-data, you are trying to write to it with a user does not have permission
you can add that user to the www-data group. Google groupadd
how do I find out which user it is ?
cat /etc/passwd and look for the name:x:1001
I added the user to the www-data group and it still says the same thing
nope Lord_Rahl  I can't do that either
then it gives the same error as before
the directory permissions are 750 how can I find out which group owns it ? because I probably shouldn't chmod all to 755
and i can't sftp in otherwise, quick phone call bac in a sec
